title: Ticket #2182: Filter "no idle jobs" submitters prior to phase 4.1
description: Submitterlimit calculations are based upon the entire set of users, even those with "no idle jobs". In cases with a large number of "no idle job" submitters within a group, Phase 4.x (particularly 4.1) does no work. The Submitterlimit value will be too low for submitters that would match slots. Pruning these submissions prior to phase 4.1 will improve performance
